<ab type="alignmentChunk" xml:id="{$chunk}"> <anchor type="collate" xml:id="C29"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <lb n="c57-0134__main__33"/> <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/>
<seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> To Victor Fankenstein <lb n="c57-0134__main__34"/> <mod sID="c57-0134__main__d4e25000"/> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0134__main__d4e25002"/>May <sga-add eID="c57-0134__main__d4e25002"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0134__main__d4e25005">Feb.</del> <mod eID="c57-0134__main__d4e25000"/> 1<damage type="inkblot">8</damage> – 17— <lb n="c57-0134__main__35"/>My dearest Friend. <lb n="c57-0135__main__1"/>It <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> gave me the greatest pleasure to <lb n="c57-0135__main__2"/>receive a letter from my Uncle dated at <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <lb n="c57-0135__main__3"/>Paris. <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> You are no longer at a <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> formi <mod sID="c57-0135__main__d4e25031"/> <mdel>t</mdel> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0135__main__d4e25035"/>d <sga-add eID="c57-0135__main__d4e25035"/><mod eID="c57-0135__main__d4e25031"/> able <lb n="c57-0135__main__4"/>distance <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> and I may hope to see you in <lb n="c57-0135__main__5"/>less than a fortnight. <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> My poor Cousin<unclear>!</unclear> <lb n="c57-0135__main__6"/>How much must you have suffered! <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> <lb n="c57-0135__main__7"/>I expect to see you looking even more <lb n="c57-0135__main__8"/>ill than when you quitted Geneva. This <lb n="c57-0135__main__9"/>winter has been passed most <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> miserably <lb n="c57-0135__main__10"/>but although happiness will not shine <lb n="c57-0135__main__11"/>in our eyes for many months <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> yet I <lb n="c57-0135__main__12"/>hope to <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <mod sID="c57-0135__main__d4e25061"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0135__main__d4e25063"/> <metamark>^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0135__main__d4e25063"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0135__main__d4e25068"/>see <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0135__main__d4e25068"/><mod eID="c57-0135__main__d4e25061"/>peace in your <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> countenance <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> & to <lb n="c57-0135__main__13"/>find that your heart is not totally <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <lb n="c57-0135__main__14"/>devoid <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> of comfort & <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> tranquility. <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <lb n="c57-0135__main__15"/>Yet <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> I fear that <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0135__main__d4e25081">,</del> the same feelings <lb n="c57-0135__main__16"/>now exist that made you so miserable <lb n="c57-0135__main__17"/>a year <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/>
<seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> ago <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> even perhaps augmented by time. <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <lb n="c57-0135__main__18"/> I would not at this period disturb you <lb n="c57-0135__main__19"/>when so many misfortunes weigh upon <lb n="c57-0135__main__20"/>you <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> but a conversation that I had <lb n="c57-0135__main__21"/>with my uncle previous to his departure <lb n="c57-0135__main__22"/>renders some explanation necessary <lb n="c57-0135__main__23"/>before we meet. <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <lb n="c57-0135__main__24"/>Explanation, <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> you may possibly <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> say, <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> <lb n="c57-0135__main__25"/>what can Elizabeth have to explain? <lb n="c57-0135__main__26"/>If you really say <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> this <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> my questions are <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <lb n="c57-0135__main__27"/>answered <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> and <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> I have no more to do than <lb n="c57-0135__main__28"/>to sign myself your affectionate cousin. <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> <lb n="c57-0135__main__29"/>But you are distant from <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> me &<delSpan rend="strikethrough" spanTo="#c57-0135.01"/>I can <lb n="c57-0135__main__30"/>not <delSpan anchor="c57-0135.01"/> <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> it is possible that you may <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> dread &<lb n="c57-0135__main__31"/>yet <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> be pleased with this <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> explanation <lb n="c57-0135__main__32"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0135__main__d4e25128">af</del> <delSpan rend="strikethrough" spanTo="#c57-0135.02"/>and if such could be the case I <lb n="c57-0135__main__33"/>cannot delay it <delSpan anchor="c57-0135.02"/> and <mod sID="c57-0135__main__d4e25137"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0135__main__d4e25139">with</del> <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0135__main__d4e25142"/>in <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0135__main__d4e25142"/> <mdel>a</mdel> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0135__main__d4e25147"/>the <sga-add eID="c57-0135__main__d4e25147"/><mod eID="c57-0135__main__d4e25137"/> <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> probability of <lb n="c57-0135__main__34"/>this being the <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> case <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> I dare not <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> postpone <lb n="c57-0135__main__35"/>any longer <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/>
<seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> to write what <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> during your <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <lb n="c57-0135__main__36"/>absence <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> I have often wished to express <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> to <lb n="c57-0136__main__1"/>to <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/>
<seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> you <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> but have never had courage to begin. <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <lb n="c57-0136__main__2"/>You <mod sID="c57-0136__main__d4e25175"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0136__main__d4e25177"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0136__main__d4e25177"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0136__main__d4e25183"/>well <sga-add eID="c57-0136__main__d4e25183"/><mod eID="c57-0136__main__d4e25175"/>know, Victor, that <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0136__main__d4e25191">it</del> our union <lb n="c57-0136__main__3"/>had been the favourite plan of <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/>
<seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> my aunt <lb n="c57-0136__main__4"/>and uncle <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> ever since our <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> infancy– <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> We were <lb n="c57-0136__main__5"/>told this when <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> young <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> and taught to look <lb n="c57-0136__main__6"/>forward to it as an event that would <lb n="c57-0136__main__7"/>certainly take place. We were affectionate <lb n="c57-0136__main__8"/>playfellow<sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0136__main__d4e25207"/>s <sga-add eID="c57-0136__main__d4e25207"/>during <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> childhood & <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> I <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> beli <mod sID="c57-0136__main__d4e25210"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0136__main__d4e25212"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0136__main__d4e25212"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0136__main__d4e25218"/>e <sga-add eID="c57-0136__main__d4e25218"/><mod eID="c57-0136__main__d4e25210"/> ve <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> <lb n="c57-0136__main__9"/>dear & <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <mod sID="c57-0136__main__d4e25224"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0136__main__d4e25226">beloved</del> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0136__main__d4e25229"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0136__main__d4e25229"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0136__main__d4e25235"/>valued <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0136__main__d4e25235"/><mod eID="c57-0136__main__d4e25224"/>friends to one another <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> when <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> <lb n="c57-0136__main__10"/>we grew older. But as <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> a brother & sister <lb n="c57-0136__main__11"/>often entertain a lively affection towards <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/>
<seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <lb n="c57-0136__main__12"/>one another <mod sID="c57-0136__main__d4e25246"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0136__main__d4e25248"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0136__main__d4e25248"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0136__main__d4e25254"/>without desiring a more intimate <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> union <sga-add eID="c57-0136__main__d4e25254"/><mod eID="c57-0136__main__d4e25246"/> <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> may not <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <mod sID="c57-0136__main__d4e25258"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0136__main__d4e25260">this</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0136__main__d4e25263"/>such <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0136__main__d4e25263"/><mod eID="c57-0136__main__d4e25258"/>also be <lb n="c57-0136__main__13"/>our <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> case. <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> Tell me, dearest <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> Victor, <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> Answer <lb n="c57-0136__main__14"/>me, I conjure <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> you <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> by our mutual <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <w ana="start"/>happi<lb n="c57-0136__main__15"/>ness<w ana="end"/>, <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> with simple <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> truth do <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> you not love <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <lb n="c57-0136__main__16"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0136__main__d4e25283">as you would wish to love a wife</del> <lb n="c57-0136__main__17"/>another? <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/>
<seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <lb n="c57-0136__main__18"/>You <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> have <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> travelled, <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> you have spent <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <lb n="c57-0136__main__19"/><mod sID="c57-0136__main__d4e25295"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0136__main__d4e25297">some</del> <anchor xml:id="c57-0136.01"/><lb n="c57-0136__left_margin__1"/><sga-add sID="c57-0136__left_margin__d4e25306"/>several <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0136__left_margin__d4e25306"/><mod eID="c57-0136__main__d4e25295"/>years of <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> you <mod sID="c57-0136__main__d4e25310"/> <mdel>ng</mdel> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0136__main__d4e25314"/>r <sga-add eID="c57-0136__main__d4e25314"/><mod eID="c57-0136__main__d4e25310"/> <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> life at <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> Ingolstadt–&<lb n="c57-0136__main__20"/>I <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> confess to <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0136__main__d4e25321">m</del> you, my <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/>
<seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> friend <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> that when <lb n="c57-0136__main__21"/>I saw you last Autumn so <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> unhappy <lb n="c57-0136__main__22"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0136__main__d4e25328">& obstinately</del> flying <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> from the society <lb n="c57-0136__main__23"/>of every <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> creature to solitude &<w ana="start"/>despon<lb n="c57-0136__main__24"/>dency<w ana="end"/> <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> I could not help supposing <lb n="c57-0136__main__25"/>that you might regret our <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> connection <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> <lb n="c57-0136__main__26"/>& believe <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> your self <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> bound in honour <lb n="c57-0136__main__27"/>to fulfil the wishes of your <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> parents <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> <lb n="c57-0136__main__28"/>although they opposed themselves to <lb n="c57-0136__main__29"/>your inclinations. But this is false <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <lb n="c57-0136__main__30"/>resoning. <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0136__main__d4e25353">I lo</del> <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> I confess to <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> you <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> my <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <lb n="c57-0136__main__31"/>cousin <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> that I <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0136__main__d4e25362">have</del> love <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/>
<seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> you &<lb n="c57-0136__main__32"/>that <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> in my airy <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> castles <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> of futurity <lb n="c57-0136__main__33"/>you have been my constant friend <lb n="c57-0137__main__1"/>and companion. But it is your <w ana="start"/>hap<lb n="c57-0137__main__2"/>piness<w ana="end"/> I desire as well as my <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> own <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0137__main__d4e25386">felicity</del> <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> <lb n="c57-0137__main__3"/>when I declare to <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> you <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> that our marriage <lb n="c57-0137__main__4"/>would render me eternally <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_start"/> miserable <seg xml:id="{ancestor::app/@xml:id}-{@wit}_end"/> <lb n="c57-0137__main__5"/>unless it were the dictate of your own <lb n="c57-0137__main__6"/>free choice.
